snippet: The proposals, which await a final Senate vote, call for new ammunition magazine limits and universal background checks.
abstract: Colorado Senate gives preliminary approval to package of gun bills, including measures that would require universal background checks for private gun sales and limit ammunition magazines to 15 rounds.
lead_paragraph: The proposals, which await a final Senate vote, call for new ammunition magazine limits and universal background checks.

headline.seo: Colorado Senate Advances Strict Gun Control Measures
headline.main: After Rancorous Debate, Colorado Senate Advances Strict New Measures on Gun Control
headline.print_headline: After Rancorous Debate, Colorado Senate Advances Strict New Measures on Gun Control
